validation.min: This field is too short (min: {min} characters).
validation.max: This field is too long (max: {max} characters).

error.unknownErrorDescription: It's probably a bug, the person responsible won't get any dessert.

layout.registerDevice: Would you like to receive notifications on this device? Activate them in <link>your settings</link>.

authentication.description: Enter the email address of your LETS account to access the app.
authentication.authenticationLinkRequested: If your email address is authorized, an email containing an authentication link was sent to you at {email}. If you didn't receive anything within a few minutes, check your spams or contact us.
authentication.invalidAuthenticationLink: The link you used to sign in is invalid, try requesting a new one.
authentication.authenticationLinkExpired: The link you used to sign in has expired, try requesting a new one.

welcome.title: Welcome on the LETS's app!
welcome.sentence2: Please take a moment to check and update your profile information.

name.title: Name
name.sentence1: Your first and last name will be visible to all members. However, they will not be made public outside the app.

contact.title: Contact
contact.sentence1: Check your contact information. You can also indicate whether you want to make these information public to other LETS members. When a field is made visible, it will be displayed on your member page.
contact.emailReadOnly: You can't edit your email address

bio.title: About
bio.sentence1: Write a few words introduce yourself. What are your interests? What kind of help can you provide? What type of activities are you interested in?
bio.sentence2: You can change your presentation at any time from your profile page.

address.sentence: Enter your address to add it to your profile page and locate you on the map showing all members.
address.title: Address

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.pushPermissionDenied: You have blocked access to notifications on this device, please change your choice in your browser settings.

end.sentence2: As this app is under development, you are expected to encounter bugs, or to find certain features no be suboptimal. Don't hesitate to share your feedback, so that together we can build an app that suits everyone.

notFound.title: Member not found
notFound.description: This page refers to a member who does not exist.

requests.title: Requests
requests.noRequests: No request has been created yet.
requests.date: The {date, date, medium} at {date, time, short}

answersList.title: Answers
answersList.empty: No answer has been made yet.

requests.notAvailable: Transactions are not available on the app yet.

form.dateIsPast: The date must be in the future

interests.noInterests: No center of interest was created.
interests.noSearchResults: No center of interest match this search query.
interests.searchPlaceholder: Search through the centers of interests.
interests.noMembers: This center of interest has no members.

profile.emailAddressReadOnly: Email address cannot be edited, please contact us if you need to change it.
profile.profilePictureMessage: Profile photo management is not yet available directly via the app. In the meantime, it is possible to change your image via <link>gravatar</link> (after registration).
profile.saved: Your profile information have been updated.

address.description: Search for your address and select a result to update it on your profile. If you can't find it, contact us so we can update it manually.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: How would you like to receive notifications?
notifications.deviceNotRegisteredDescription: <register>Click here</register> to authorize this smartphone to receive notifications.
notifications.notificationPermissionDenied: You have denied access to notifications on this device. To change this choice, update the notification permissions in your browser settings.
notifications.deviceRegistered: Your smartphone is correctly configured to receive notifications
notifications.deviceRegistrationFailed: Your smartphone won't be able to receive notifications.
notifications.emailDescription: Notifications are sent by email to {email}.
notifications.pushDescription: Notifications are sent to your smartphone (after installing the app).
notifications.saved: Your notification settings have been saved.

signOut.description: To sign out of the app, click the button below.
